Forbes' list of the most valuable football clubs
Main page                      This is a list of the richest association football clubs in the world as ranked by Forbes magazine on their worth in U.S. dollars.

Manchester United increased from $1.2 billion to $1.8 billion still remaining at top. While Real Madrid remains second due to
an increase of $400 million. Arsenal also remain third after an approximate increase of $350 million.
This is the list released in March 2007.[24]
